name: git-hex-resolveConflict
description: Mark a conflicting file as resolved. Works for modified files and delete conflicts.

repoPath.description: Path to git repository (optional; defaults to the single configured root if omitted)

file.description: Path to the conflicting file (POSIX, repo-relative only; absolute, drive-letter, or traversal paths are rejected)

resolution.description: For delete conflicts: 'keep' to keep the file, 'delete' to accept deletion
